#### About me

I’m an Economics PhD student at Universidad de los Andes. My primary interests are Environmental economics, Illegal Fishing and Development Economics.

I will be in the Economics Job Markets in 2023-2024. You can find my CV <a href="https://jorgephd.github.io/jorge-montero.github.io/cv/CV_JorgeMontero.pdf">here</a>
and my Job Market Paper <a href="https://jorgephd.github.io/jorge-montero.github.io/research/jmp/MPAs_Fishing_MRE_vf.pdf">here</a>.
